Package nl.helixsoft.recordstream Description

Classes for treating data as a stream of records. Data from some source (e.g. a file, a database, a triplestore) is read and processed one by one. This approach can handle large datasets with minimum memory usage. Some of the classes in this package will be obsoleted by Java 8, for example Predicate, Function, Supplier and Stream.
